verses.kjv: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
verses.ct: How happy are those whose lives are blameless, who live according to the LORD's instructions.

verses.kjv: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.
verses.ct: How happy are those who follow his rules and pursue him with complete devotion.

verses.kjv: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.
verses.ct: They commit no wrong — they follow his paths.

verses.kjv: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.
verses.ct: You have ordered us to carefully obey your guidelines.

verses.kjv: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!
verses.ct: I wish my life were firmly set on obeying your decrees!

verses.kjv: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.
verses.ct: Then I would never be disgraced, because I would honor all your commands.

verses.kjv: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.
verses.ct: I will thank you with a sincere heart as I come to understand your righteous decisions.

verses.kjv: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.
verses.ct: I will follow your decrees — please don't completely abandon me.

verses.kjv: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.
verses.ct: How can a young person stay on the right track? By living according to your word.

verses.kjv: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.
verses.ct: I have pursued you with everything in me — don't let me stray from your commands.

verses.kjv: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
verses.ct: I have stored your word deep in my heart so that I won't sin against you.

verses.kjv: Blessed art thou, O LORD: teach me thy statutes.
verses.ct: You deserve all praise, LORD — teach me your decrees.

verses.kjv: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.
verses.ct: I have spoken aloud every decision that comes from your mouth.

verses.kjv: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.
verses.ct: Following your rules brings me as much joy as having every kind of wealth.

verses.kjv: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.
verses.ct: I will reflect deeply on your guidelines and pay close attention to your paths.

verses.kjv: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word.
verses.ct: I will find my pleasure in your decrees — I will never forget your word.

verses.kjv: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live, and keep thy word.
verses.ct: Be generous to your servant so that I may live and follow your word.

verses.kjv: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.
verses.ct: Open my eyes so I can see the amazing truths in your instructions.

verses.kjv: I am a stranger in the earth: hide not thy commandments from me.
verses.ct: I am just passing through this earth — don't keep your commands hidden from me.

verses.kjv: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times.
verses.ct: My soul aches with a constant longing for your decisions.

verses.kjv: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, which do err from thy commandments.
verses.ct: You have confronted the arrogant — those who are cursed because they wander from your commands.

verses.kjv: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.
verses.ct: Take away the shame and disrespect I face, because I have followed your rules.

verses.kjv: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.
verses.ct: Even when rulers sat together and plotted against me, your servant kept reflecting on your decrees.

verses.kjv: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.
verses.ct: Your rules are my source of joy and my trusted advisors.

verses.kjv: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.
verses.ct: I am lying face down in the dust — revive me as your word promises.

verses.kjv: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.
verses.ct: I laid out my situation before you, and you answered me — now teach me your decrees.

verses.kjv: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.
verses.ct: Help me grasp the meaning of your guidelines, and I will talk about your incredible works.

verses.kjv: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
verses.ct: My soul is weighed down with grief — strengthen me as your word promises.

verses.kjv: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.
verses.ct: Keep me far from dishonest living, and graciously give me your instructions.

verses.kjv: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.
verses.ct: I have committed myself to the path of truth — I have placed your decisions right in front of me.

verses.kjv: I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O LORD, put me not to shame.
verses.ct: I hold tightly to your rules — LORD, don't let me be humiliated.

verses.kjv: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.
verses.ct: I will eagerly pursue your commands when you expand my understanding.

verses.kjv: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.
verses.ct: LORD, show me how to follow your decrees, and I will keep them to the very end.

verses.kjv: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.
verses.ct: Give me insight, and I will obey your instructions — yes, I will follow them wholeheartedly.

verses.kjv: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.
verses.ct: Guide me along the road of your commands, because that is where I find my joy.

verses.kjv: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.
verses.ct: Turn my heart toward your rules and away from selfish greed.

verses.kjv: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.
verses.ct: Redirect my eyes from worthless things, and revive me through your ways.

verses.kjv: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.
verses.ct: Confirm your promise to your servant — the one who is wholeheartedly dedicated to you.

verses.kjv: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.
verses.ct: Take away the disgrace that I dread, because your decisions are good.

verses.kjv: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.
verses.ct: Look — I have yearned for your guidelines. Revive me through your righteousness.

verses.kjv: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O LORD, even thy salvation, according to thy word.
verses.ct: Let your mercy reach me, LORD — your salvation, just as your word promises.

verses.kjv: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.
verses.ct: Then I will have an answer for anyone who mocks me, because I put my trust in your word.

verses.kjv: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.
verses.ct: Don't ever take the word of truth completely from my mouth, because I have placed my hope in your decisions.

verses.kjv: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.
verses.ct: Then I will always obey your instructions, forever and ever.

verses.kjv: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.
verses.ct: I will live in freedom, because I pursue your guidelines.

verses.kjv: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.
verses.ct: I will speak about your rules even in the presence of kings, and I will not be embarrassed.

verses.kjv: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved.
verses.ct: I find great pleasure in your commands, which I truly love.

verses.kjv: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.
verses.ct: I will reach out my hands toward your commands that I love, and I will reflect deeply on your decrees.

verses.kjv: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
verses.ct: Remember the promise you made to your servant — the one you gave me to hope in.

verses.kjv: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.
verses.ct: This is what comforts me in my suffering: your word has given me life.

verses.kjv: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.
verses.ct: Arrogant people have ridiculed me relentlessly, but I have not turned away from your instructions.

verses.kjv: I remembered thy judgments of old, O LORD; and have comforted myself.
verses.ct: I recalled your ancient decisions, LORD, and they brought me comfort.

verses.kjv: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.
verses.ct: Burning anger grips me because of the wicked who abandon your instructions.

verses.kjv: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.
verses.ct: Your decrees have been the songs I sing wherever I have lived as a traveler.

verses.kjv: I have remembered thy name, O LORD, in the night, and have kept thy law.
verses.ct: During the night I remember your name, LORD, and I follow your instructions.

verses.kjv: This I had, because I kept thy precepts.
verses.ct: This blessing has been mine because I have obeyed your guidelines.

verses.kjv: Thou art my portion, O LORD: I have said that I would keep thy words.
verses.ct: You are my share in life, LORD — I have promised to follow your words.

verses.kjv: I intreated thy favour with my whole heart: be merciful unto me according to thy word.
verses.ct: I sought your favor with all my heart — show me mercy as your word promises.

verses.kjv: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
verses.ct: I examined my life carefully and redirected my steps toward your rules.

verses.kjv: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.
verses.ct: I rushed without hesitation to obey your commands.

verses.kjv: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.
verses.ct: The ropes of the wicked have tangled around me, but I have not forgotten your instructions.

verses.kjv: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments.
verses.ct: At midnight I get up to thank you for your righteous decisions.

verses.kjv: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.
verses.ct: I am a friend to everyone who deeply reveres you and follows your guidelines.

verses.kjv: The earth, O LORD, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.
verses.ct: The earth, LORD, is filled with your mercy — teach me your decrees.

verses.kjv: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O LORD, according unto thy word.
verses.ct: You have treated your servant well, LORD, just as your word promised.

verses.kjv: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.
verses.ct: Teach me sound judgment and knowledge, because I have trusted your commands.

verses.kjv: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.
verses.ct: Before I went through hardship, I wandered off course, but now I follow your word.

verses.kjv: Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.
verses.ct: You are good, and what you do is good — teach me your decrees.

verses.kjv: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.
verses.ct: Arrogant people have smeared me with lies, but I obey your guidelines with my whole heart.

verses.kjv: Their heart is as fat as grease; but I delight in thy law.
verses.ct: Their hearts are dull and unfeeling, but I find my pleasure in your instructions.

verses.kjv: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.
verses.ct: Going through hardship was actually good for me — it helped me learn your decrees.

verses.kjv: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.
verses.ct: The instructions from your mouth are worth more to me than thousands of pieces of gold and silver.

verses.kjv: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.
verses.ct: Your hands made me and shaped me — give me understanding so I can learn your commands.

verses.kjv: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.
verses.ct: Those who deeply revere you will be glad when they see me, because I have put my hope in your word.

verses.kjv: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.
verses.ct: I know, LORD, that your decisions are right, and that you allowed me to suffer because of your faithfulness.

verses.kjv: Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, according to thy word unto thy servant.
verses.ct: Please let your loyal love comfort me, as you promised your servant.

verses.kjv: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live: for thy law is my delight.
verses.ct: Let your compassion reach me so that I may live, because your instructions are my joy.

verses.kjv: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.
verses.ct: Let the arrogant be put to shame, because they wronged me for no reason — but I will reflect on your guidelines.

verses.kjv: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.
verses.ct: Let those who deeply revere you come back to me — those who understand your rules.

verses.kjv: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; that I be not ashamed.
verses.ct: Let my heart be completely devoted to your decrees so that I will not be disgraced.

verses.kjv: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.
verses.ct: My soul is exhausted waiting for your salvation, but I hold on to your word.

verses.kjv: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?
verses.ct: My eyes are worn out searching for your word, asking, 'When will you bring me relief?'

verses.kjv: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.
verses.ct: I have become like a wineskin dried out by smoke, yet I still haven't forgotten your decrees.

verses.kjv: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?
verses.ct: How long must your servant wait? When will you bring justice against those who persecute me?

verses.kjv: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.
verses.ct: Arrogant people have dug traps for me — people who disregard your instructions.

verses.kjv: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.
verses.ct: All your commands are trustworthy. These people persecute me without cause — help me!

verses.kjv: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.
verses.ct: They nearly wiped me off the earth, but I did not abandon your guidelines.

verses.kjv: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.
verses.ct: Revive me through your loyal love, and I will obey the rules you have spoken.

verses.kjv: For ever, O LORD, thy word is settled in heaven.
verses.ct: Your word, LORD, stands firm in heaven forever.

verses.kjv: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
verses.ct: Your faithfulness extends through every generation — you established the earth, and it remains.

verses.kjv: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.
verses.ct: Everything continues to this day according to your design, because all things serve you.

verses.kjv: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.
verses.ct: If your instructions had not been my joy, I would have been destroyed in my suffering.

verses.kjv: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.
verses.ct: I will never forget your guidelines, because through them you gave me life.

verses.kjv: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.
verses.ct: I belong to you — rescue me! I have devoted myself to your guidelines.

verses.kjv: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.
verses.ct: The wicked have been waiting to destroy me, but I carefully consider your rules.

verses.kjv: I have seen an end of all perfection: but thy commandment is exceeding broad.
verses.ct: I have seen that everything has its limits, but your commands are boundless.

verses.kjv: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.
verses.ct: How deeply I love your instructions! I think about them all day long.

verses.kjv: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.
verses.ct: Your commands have made me wiser than my enemies, because they are always with me.

verses.kjv: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.
verses.ct: I have gained more insight than all my teachers, because your rules are what I reflect on.

verses.kjv: I understand more than the ancients, because I keep thy precepts.
verses.ct: I have more understanding than those with years of experience, because I follow your guidelines.

verses.kjv: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.
verses.ct: I have kept my feet away from every wrong path so that I could obey your word.

verses.kjv: I have not departed from thy judgments: for thou hast taught me.
verses.ct: I have not strayed from your decisions, because you yourself have taught me.

verses.kjv: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
verses.ct: How sweet your words taste to me — yes, sweeter than honey in my mouth!

verses.kjv: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.
verses.ct: Your guidelines give me understanding — that is why I despise every dishonest path.

verses.kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
verses.ct: Your word is a lamp for my feet and a light for my path.

verses.kjv: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.
verses.ct: I have made a solemn promise, and I will keep it — to follow your righteous decisions.

verses.kjv: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O LORD, according unto thy word.
verses.ct: I am suffering deeply — LORD, revive me as your word promises.

verses.kjv: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, and teach me thy judgments.
verses.ct: Please accept the willing praise from my mouth, LORD, and teach me your decisions.

verses.kjv: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.
verses.ct: My life is constantly at risk, yet I never forget your instructions.

verses.kjv: The wicked have laid a snare for me: yet I erred not from thy precepts.
verses.ct: The wicked have set a trap for me, but I have not strayed from your guidelines.

verses.kjv: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.
verses.ct: Your rules are my permanent inheritance — they are the joy of my heart.

verses.kjv: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway, even unto the end.
verses.ct: I have committed myself to carrying out your decrees always, right to the very end.

verses.kjv: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.
verses.ct: I despise divided loyalties, but I love your instructions.

verses.kjv: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
verses.ct: You are my shelter and my shield — I place my hope in your word.

verses.kjv: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.
verses.ct: Get away from me, you who do evil, because I intend to follow my God's commands.

verses.kjv: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.
verses.ct: Support me as your word promises so that I may live — don't let my hope end in disappointment.

verses.kjv: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.
verses.ct: Hold me steady, and I will be secure — I will always pay attention to your decrees.

verses.kjv: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: for their deceit is falsehood.
verses.ct: You have rejected everyone who strays from your decrees, because their scheming is nothing but lies.

verses.kjv: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.
verses.ct: You discard all the wicked of the earth like worthless waste — that is why I love your rules.

verses.kjv: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.
verses.ct: My body trembles in reverence before you, and I stand in awe of your decisions.

verses.kjv: I have done judgment and justice: leave me not to mine oppressors.
verses.ct: I have acted with justice and integrity — don't leave me at the mercy of my oppressors.

verses.kjv: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.
verses.ct: Guarantee your servant's well-being — don't let the arrogant crush me.

verses.kjv: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.
verses.ct: My eyes are strained from watching for your salvation and for your righteous promise.

verses.kjv: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.
verses.ct: Treat your servant according to your mercy, and teach me your decrees.

verses.kjv: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.
verses.ct: I am your servant — give me understanding so I can grasp your rules.

verses.kjv: It is time for thee, LORD, to work: for they have made void thy law.
verses.ct: It is time for you to act, LORD, because people have violated your instructions.

verses.kjv: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.
verses.ct: That is why I love your commands more than gold — more than the purest gold.

verses.kjv: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.
verses.ct: That is why I consider all your guidelines to be completely right, and I despise every dishonest path.

verses.kjv: Thy testimonies are wonderful: therefore doth my soul keep them.
verses.ct: Your rules are extraordinary — that is why my soul obeys them.

verses.kjv: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
verses.ct: When your words are opened up, they bring light — they give understanding to the inexperienced.

verses.kjv: I opened my mouth, and panted: for I longed for thy commandments.
verses.ct: I opened my mouth and gasped for breath, because I was desperate for your commands.

verses.kjv: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.
verses.ct: Turn to me and show me mercy, just as you always do for those who love your name.

verses.kjv: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
verses.ct: Direct my steps by your word, and don't let any sin control me.

verses.kjv: Deliver me from the oppression of man: so will I keep thy precepts.
verses.ct: Rescue me from human oppression so that I can follow your guidelines.

verses.kjv: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; and teach me thy statutes.
verses.ct: Look on your servant with favor, and teach me your decrees.

verses.kjv: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.
verses.ct: Streams of tears pour from my eyes because people do not follow your instructions.

verses.kjv: Righteous art thou, O LORD, and upright are thy judgments.
verses.ct: You are righteous, LORD, and your decisions are fair.

verses.kjv: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.
verses.ct: The rules you have established are righteous and completely trustworthy.

verses.kjv: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.
verses.ct: My passion burns inside me because my enemies have ignored your words.

verses.kjv: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.
verses.ct: Your word has been tested and proven pure — that is why your servant loves it.

verses.kjv: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.
verses.ct: I am insignificant and looked down on, yet I do not forget your guidelines.

verses.kjv: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.
verses.ct: Your righteousness lasts forever, and your instructions are truth.

verses.kjv: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.
verses.ct: Trouble and distress have overtaken me, yet your commands remain my joy.

verses.kjv: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.
verses.ct: Your rules are righteous forever — give me understanding, and I will live.

verses.kjv: I cried with my whole heart; hear me, O LORD: I will keep thy statutes.
verses.ct: I called out with all my heart — answer me, LORD! I will obey your decrees.

verses.kjv: I cried unto thee; save me, and I shall keep thy testimonies.
verses.ct: I called out to you — save me, and I will follow your rules.

verses.kjv: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.
verses.ct: I got up before dawn and cried for help — I placed my hope in your word.

verses.kjv: Mine eyes prevent the night watches, that I might meditate in thy word.
verses.ct: My eyes stay open through the watches of the night so I can reflect on your word.

verses.kjv: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O LORD, quicken me according to thy judgment.
verses.ct: Listen to my voice because of your loyal love — LORD, revive me according to your justice.

verses.kjv: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.
verses.ct: Those who chase after evil schemes are closing in — they are far from your instructions.

verses.kjv: Thou art near, O LORD; and all thy commandments are truth.
verses.ct: But you are near, LORD, and all your commands are truth.

verses.kjv: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.
verses.ct: Long ago I learned from your rules that you established them to last forever.

verses.kjv: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.
verses.ct: See my suffering and rescue me, because I have not forgotten your instructions.

verses.kjv: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.
verses.ct: Defend my cause and set me free — revive me as your word promises.

verses.kjv: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.
verses.ct: Salvation is far from the wicked, because they do not pursue your decrees.

verses.kjv: Great are thy tender mercies, O LORD: quicken me according to thy judgments.
verses.ct: Your compassion is immense, LORD — revive me according to your decisions.

verses.kjv: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.
verses.ct: I have many persecutors and enemies, yet I have not turned away from your rules.

verses.kjv: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.
verses.ct: I looked at those who betray you and felt sick, because they do not follow your word.

verses.kjv: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O LORD, according to thy lovingkindness.
verses.ct: See how much I love your guidelines — LORD, revive me through your loyal love.

verses.kjv: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.
verses.ct: The essence of your word is truth, and every one of your righteous decisions lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Princes have persecuted me without a cause: but my heart standeth in awe of thy word.
verses.ct: Powerful people have persecuted me for no reason, but my heart stands in awe of your word.

verses.kjv: I rejoice at thy word, as one that findeth great spoil.
verses.ct: I celebrate over your word like someone who discovers a great treasure.

verses.kjv: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.
verses.ct: I hate and detest dishonesty, but I love your instructions.

verses.kjv: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.
verses.ct: 7 times a day I praise you for your righteous decisions.

verses.kjv: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.
verses.ct: Those who love your instructions have deep peace, and nothing can make them stumble.

verses.kjv: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.
verses.ct: LORD, I have waited for your salvation and carried out your commands.

verses.kjv: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.
verses.ct: My soul has followed your rules, and I love them deeply.

verses.kjv: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.
verses.ct: I have obeyed your guidelines and your rules, because everything I do is visible to you.

verses.kjv: Let my cry come near before thee, O LORD: give me understanding according to thy word.
verses.ct: Let my cry reach your presence, LORD — give me understanding as your word promises.

verses.kjv: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.
verses.ct: Let my plea come before you — rescue me as your word promises.

verses.kjv: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.
verses.ct: My lips will overflow with praise when you teach me your decrees.

verses.kjv: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.
verses.ct: My tongue will sing about your word, because all your commands are righteousness.

verses.kjv: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.
verses.ct: Let your hand be ready to help me, because I have chosen your guidelines.

verses.kjv: I have longed for thy salvation, O LORD; and thy law is my delight.
verses.ct: I have longed for your salvation, LORD, and your instructions are my joy.

verses.kjv: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.
verses.ct: Let me live so that I can praise you, and let your decisions sustain me.

verses.kjv: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
verses.ct: I have wandered off like a lost sheep — come find your servant, because I have not forgotten your commands.
